job.title: Software System Test Engineer
job.description:
Description:
The 5G Software team develops software for the next generation of modems. The test engineer will work closely with software, systems, and firmware engineers to develop test cases, test tools and test environments with a specific focus on automation.
MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.
Scripting experience specifically in Perl and/or Python
Test methodologies, debug and test development
Software development in a real-time environment, including data structures and OS concepts
Wireless communication systems (or DSP)
Preferred Qualifications:
Relevant experience with system test
Experience in wireless communication and embedded devices
Experience with communications systems including both physical and upper layers, and knowledge in evaluating wireless communications systems through log analysis isolating issues
